channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US expands militarized zones to 1/3 of southern border, stirring controversy
item.description: Annexed militarized zones will soon cover nearly one-third of the U.S. border with Mexico, empowering soldiers to arrest people who cross the border illegally.

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ lawyers say he is a changed man. Will that spare him from more time behind bars?
What to know about Julio César Chávez’s arrest by US immigration officials
